website_summaries.verdict: Detailed instructions make this kit ideal for beginners looking to take up a new hobby.
pros: Metal hooks come in a variety of fun, metallic colors
Included book provides clear instructions, helpful tips, and diagrams that are perfect for beginners
Some instructions are shown from both left and right-hand perspectives
cons: Kit doesn't include any sort of storage container or bag

customer_reviews.title: What you see is NOT what you get.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to start learning to crochet. I did not get the kit as described. There was no yarn needles or afghan needle. Instead there was cheap tiny scissors (broke) and a few stitch markers. The book cover is different but I assume it's the same beginner instruction. The 5 hooks & gauge are the same. I felt like returning the kit but I didn't have the time. I needed the hooks to start my lesson.
customer_reviews.author: RBOZ

customer_reviews.title: Love that it has the basic stitches in both left ...
customer_reviews.text: Love that it has the basic stitches in both left and right hand as I'm a lefty, but everything else is in right hand like rounds and finishing the piece. Would have loved it even more if it had shown all the lessons in both. Not sure why my book is different than the one pictured, but it came with scissors so can't complain too much, lol.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy O'Roak

customer_reviews.title: It's ok.
customer_reviews.text: I was not able to learn from this book. I ended up using YouTube more than anything. I think that says more about me and how I learn, than the book itself, but as such it's hard for me to give an objective review. I did benefit a little from the small section on interpreting patterns, and the fact that you get 4 hooks, a gauge card and other things with it made it a worthwhile purchase for me. I did end up using different hooks long term, but that comes to preference, and for learning I think the ones here are fine.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Decent beginners kit
customer_reviews.text: This is a good choice for beginners. I learned enough to start making a blanket on day one of using the kit. I did have to look up a couple of you tube videos for clarification on how to start a new row properly but I am a complete beginner and seeing it done slowly in a video to was a helpful addition to the instructions and images provided in the kit. The scissors are pretty flimsy but the needles seem to be of decent quality and come in the needle sizes recommended by a few instructors on blueprint who offer learn to crochet classes.
customer_reviews.author: Nani

customer_reviews.title: Nice Quality
customer_reviews.text: Four instead of five because I still can't get the patterns to work for me--I have much better luck on You Tube. But the hooks are good quality and you get a whole skein of yarn to practice with plus the gauge, so worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: KimM

customer_reviews.title: I am having fun teaching her how to crochet
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 11 year old Granddaughter, Aine. I am having fun teaching her how to crochet.
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth tardy

customer_reviews.title: Great starter set
customer_reviews.text: You get what is advertised in here, though I did find a case that holds everything and has a lot more tools for a cheaper price. However, this one comes with the book, which is where I think the value is! You would want to be buying this for the book, though in quite a few cases, I had to just look up videos on YouTube.
customer_reviews.author: Corissa H.

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this kit to teach myself how to crochet and it's very easy to follow. With a little practice I feel like I'm almost a pro. I would highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: False picture
customer_reviews.text: This was not what the picture shows. It looks like a nice set but now I have to go out and find the acutal project kit I thought I was ordering
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate or confusing instructions
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the left-handed instructions. While the instructions for how to chain made sense, the instructions for how to do a single crochet stitch just didn't work for me. I found different instructions on Youtube that worked much better.
customer_reviews.author: rant_and_rave

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and the book comes with helpful
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my mother in law and she is already using it! Great quality and the book comes with helpful instructions
customer_reviews.author: Bheru Gandhi

customer_reviews.title: very happy with the hooks the book not so much its ...
customer_reviews.text: very happy with the hooks the book not so much its just ok I can find similar guides online for free nothing special really but the set was worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Edgar

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for both right handed people
customer_reviews.text: I loved that it had left handed instructions but starting a new project is hard. It does not give a lot of instruction on how to make the first few knots
customer_reviews.author: katie boggs

customer_reviews.title: Excellent details with pictured instructions
customer_reviews.text: I've been sewing most of my life but never learned to crochet. I picked up this book and was able to learn the craft right away. There are several fun blanket patterns that are perfect for a beginner as well as a few other non-blanket projects.
customer_reviews.author: MFamTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: GOOD NEEDLES THE BOOK NOT SO MUCH. I RECOMMEND BUYING JUST NEEDLES.
customer_reviews.author: Melba

customer_reviews.title: Learning K17370.001 Crochet Teacher Kit
customer_reviews.text: if this kit is bought. you do not have to buy the crochet hooks seprately, as all of the hooks are given and it also mentiones which hooks you need for which project. It is great for beiginners or if you are doing crochet after a long gap. Highly recommed. great keep it up. thanks. Fast shipment and excellent service
customer_reviews.author: vedambal

customer_reviews.title: Good book
customer_reviews.text: I liked the book because it was easy to understand and had illustrations that were easy to follow. It also had patterns that were easy to make. It was very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Frances

customer_reviews.title: Good clear instructions and I didn't have to purchase anything ...
customer_reviews.text: Good clear instructions and I didn't have to purchase anything extra other than a bit of yarn. Wish it had a couple more projects to it, but overall a good thing.
customer_reviews.author: ephemeraljokingnot

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great that it comes with all of the various tools. Pictures/instructions are not very clear for a true beginner.
customer_reviews.author: Angela K.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: As someone who is visual the instruction book is not very helpful but the material provided work well
customer_reviews.author: Dominique R. Lyles

customer_reviews.title: Not much detail on the stitches... go to youtube.
customer_reviews.text: I think maybe if you understand crochet already this book is pretty neat. If you are VERY new, I would say go to YOUTUBE for a bit, learn all the stitches by watching someone do it... then buy this book for the patterns.
customer_reviews.author: Derik Stowell

customer_reviews.title: YouTube will probably be a bit more useful.
customer_reviews.text: Not a ton of step by step help, but it is an ok start. YouTube will probably be a bit more useful.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Glover

customer_reviews.title: Liked the idea of this book but did still end ...
customer_reviews.text: Liked the idea of this book but did still end up watching a YouTube video to get past first stitch part.
customer_reviews.author: Woodysgirl

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this book to learn crochet. I'd never done it before, but after just a few minutes I was making basic stitches! I was making actual projects the next day! The pictures are very clear and helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Lianne

customer_reviews.title: Taught myself how to crochet
customer_reviews.text: I used this and some clarifying videos on YouTube when necessary and taught myself the basics of crochet in less than a week. Some cute patterns!
customer_reviews.author: Logan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my sister. She is learning to crochet.
customer_reviews.author: Janice UriarteTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Somewhat easy to follow. The order came in fast and I liked the hooks!
customer_reviews.author: Sallie Young

customer_reviews.title: Nice Book
customer_reviews.text: Very good for a beginner. Clear, precise, instructions and some projects to start on as well. It explains how to start and how to finish and everything in between.
customer_reviews.author: charlee11

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for young beginners!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item as a gift for a young learner. They said its great, with good instructions.
customer_reviews.author: A Recent Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Instructions Aren't that Great
customer_reviews.text: It's advertised as having left handed instructions, but they only have left handed instructions for four stitches. The scissors included were not very useful. The needles are nice though
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I used this book to learn to crochet. Some of the instructions were unclear, but between this book and the internet you'll be able to figure it out. The hooks seem sturdy and high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Crochet Book
customer_reviews.text: This book has some nice easy projects inside it. The only complaint was that I found it for half the price at Walmart after I bought it from Amazon!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Trudy J. Johns

customer_reviews.title: It's so lovely
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and helpful It really very good and it encourages you to do projects
customer_reviews.author: Ayman

customer_reviews.title: This book is alright...
customer_reviews.text: This is a difficult product to review because perhaps I am just a slow learner. I have had to use the book as well as online tutorials before I have been able to master a step. It is wonderful that it comes with all of the supplies and it recommends what types of yarns to use. It is very helpful and I would buy it again but you may need an additional resource.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: The needles and gauge are great, but the book that comes with it kinda ...
customer_reviews.text: The needles and gauge are great, but the book that comes with it kinda sucks. As a beginner to crochet I did not find the images easy to follow for the most basic stitches.
customer_reviews.author: CyberYuggoth

customer_reviews.title: They were very well received though so I am happy.
customer_reviews.text: Bought as gifts so I am unsure of the quality. They were very well received though so I am happy.
customer_reviews.author: ARLENE BOMBACK

customer_reviews.title: the instructions are easy to understand
customer_reviews.text: My daughter received this for Christmas, she's been teaching herself to crochet using youtube videos, and struggling. This kit offered her just the instruction she needed to go beyond practicing a few stitches to actually making projects. She's a pre teen and has used the book on her own, the instructions are easy to understand, the illustrations are helpful, and the hooks and yarn gauge are invaluable to a beginner.
customer_reviews.author: primelover

customer_reviews.title: learn to crochet
customer_reviews.text: recipient liked it . now she has to use it!
customer_reviews.author: SSR

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This came opened in the box and all of the hooks were lose.

customer_reviews.title: and she loves how easy it is too
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my niece, and she loves how easy it is too learn

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my wife for xmas. After only ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife for xmas. After only a month of using it she is now crocheting off other patterns and making everyone everything.
customer_reviews.author: Johnathan f.

customer_reviews.title: great instructions to get back into it
customer_reviews.text: Haven't crocheted in years, great instructions to get back into it!!
customer_reviews.author: Sunbrat

customer_reviews.title: Great starter kit.
customer_reviews.text: Got this to learn crochet. Took it up on a dare. This helps.,,and, besides, it has some great patterns to practice with.
customer_reviews.author: Lou Callahan

customer_reviews.title: I will learn hopefully.
customer_reviews.text: I guess I was expecting more easier instructions. It was no fault of your company, just I am not a fast learner. I will keep trying.
customer_reviews.author: Punkin

customer_reviews.title: gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for one of the daughters-in-law. I'm sure it has everything she needs to learn to crochet.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Christensen

customer_reviews.title: I was crocheting lengths of stitches the first day! ...
customer_reviews.text: I was crocheting lengths of stitches the first day! You do have to follow the instructions exactly, I had to try, reread then try again a couple of times. And remember, this is a new skill you are learning. Crocheters who make cute little baby booties have been crocheting for years. You'll have to practice, practice, practice!
customer_reviews.author: PuRL68

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a Gift
customer_reviews.text: My older daughter was learning to crochet and found this kit to be very useful with the crochet hooks and assorted accessories. Good Price.
customer_reviews.author: RunsWitBigDogs

customer_reviews.title: Great kit!
customer_reviews.text: The product came exactly as it was pictured ....I got the product for my granddaughter to help her and she loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Biggs

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent buy. Purchased one for myself and one for a friend. Have started to learn how to crochet, instructions are simple and easy to follow for both left and right handed people. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Maria E Von Helms

customer_reviews.title: cool book
customer_reviews.text: This book is awesome. The pics help a lot. Very descriptive. Projects are manageable for someone just beginning like me.
customer_reviews.author: My Experience

customer_reviews.title: Good for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Very good product for newbies into the art of crochet. Bought this for my wife and she really loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Vishnu

customer_reviews.title: Wounderful book
customer_reviews.text: This book was a gift for christmas, and she loved it. Would recommend to others. I'm thinking of purchasing it myself.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Not a good book for beginners
customer_reviews.text: This book is not helpful in learning how to crochet. It doesn't explain things well at all, there's a lot of things it just assumed you to know. It doesn't show how to hold the yarn or how to count the stitches. It just tells you to do it. Every step is very confusing. I kept referring to Google and YouTube videos to figure out what the instructions meant and according to videos I watched the instructions weren't even right. Overall not helpful in learning to crochet.
customer_reviews.author: Kari Ann West

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was gift for my daughter and it is exactly what she wanted. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tool!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful kit - I genuinely *did* teach myself to crochet with it! Clear instructions, good starting tools - what an inexpensive, quick way to learn a new and useful skill! Follow this up with some helpful youtube videos on the topic, and you will be a master in no time!
customer_reviews.author: lilcreative

customer_reviews.title: Came with wrong size crochet hooks. US sizes G ...
customer_reviews.text: Came with wrong size crochet hooks. US sizes G through K. I was hoping to use the F hook for amigurumi. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.text: Learning the techniques isn't as easy as they make it seem. The pictures in the book don't show enough detail; they should have step-by-step pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Taunie

customer_reviews.title: Loads of Answers
customer_reviews.text: Want simple, easy to follow, pictorial instructions? You need this book! Even for a seasoned pro, it's a quick visual reminder -- especially the abbreviations. Crochet hooks and stitch/ruler guide included are what you need to get started today.
customer_reviews.author: Queen B

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is fine but parts of the book are cut off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good manual for new crocheters
customer_reviews.text: Very good for a beginner....explains various stitches and has popular items for beginner projects
customer_reviews.author: decogirl

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful book on learning to crochet
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful book on learning to crochet. I have crocheted for years, but like to have a book handy. The hooks are very nice. There is a pattern for a throw in the book that needs a 14" hook. The hook that is with this kit is a 10". I purchased a 14" from Amazon. Couldn't find one locally. I highly recommend this kit.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Brophy

customer_reviews.title: Not for a true beginner
customer_reviews.text: The crochet needls and other items are of good quality. The initial directions are very clear. However, after step one, they might as well be speaking Greek. I am truly a beginner. The rest of the book made no sense to me. It would be helpful to have the directions written out for beginners, transcribed into language we can understand so we can learn how to read the patterns. The book is not a total waste of money, but I wish it gave me somthing simple that I could crochet.
customer_reviews.author: An Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: Learning experience
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for me and the granddaughters to learn a little crocheting, the 9 year old picked it up pretty quick.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Walker

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FOR THE BEGINNER
customer_reviews.text: THIS PRODUCT IS OF GOOD QUALITY. THE BOOK IS VERY VESUAL AND COLORFUL. IT IS TRULY GREAT FOR THE BEGINNER.
customer_reviews.author: MOMMY2EVA

customer_reviews.title: its hard to understand
customer_reviews.text: its hard to read its not worth the money i paid for it wish i saved my money to get something better i dont thing anyone should get this it you are begining
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Not that easy for a beginner
customer_reviews.text: The patterns are hard to follow for a beginner. The instructions are not clear and there are also no illustrations provided which would have been helpful. I tried making on of the baby blankets but had to give up as the pattern was too confusing. This book is definitely meant for a more experienced crocheter who is familiar with reading patterns. If you are a beginner, I would recommend that you get the "Crochet" kit by Anne Akers Johnson or "Getting Started Crochet" by Judith Swartz,both great books for beginners.
customer_reviews.author: G. Menon

customer_reviews.title: Step 1 - give up all hope.
customer_reviews.text: Not as easy as looks. After 2 hours of staring at the introduction pages. I gave up crocheting forever. It skips from I don’t know anything straight into I’ve been doing this forever. I need a blondes guide to crocheting. This one didn’t work.
customer_reviews.author: melissa long

customer_reviews.title: This is actually a pretty nice little set
customer_reviews.text: This is actually a pretty nice little set. The only reason I am rating it low is because it took over twenty days to arrive. I had a two day delivery. The hooks are a little rounder than the others I have, but they still work well. I just prefer a little bit more pointed hook. The instruction book is well written and easy to understand
customer_reviews.author: Jody T.

customer_reviews.title: Easy and Comprehensive
customer_reviews.text: This kit is WONDERFUL! I was able to reteach myself crochet in a matter of minutes. The pictures and instructions are easy to understand and follow. They teach the basics so well that you don't have to have any experience to learn quickly. The book even has a few simple patterns to try, which I will do for practice. The tools in the kit are easy to use, and the variety of crochet hooks is excellent. As soon as I am able to maintain even stitching I will be making an afghan for my Granddaughter. Hopefully for her birthday, but if it's not finished then, soon! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: buyzalot

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a friend who wants to learn how to crochet, someone had actually bought me something similar when I was learning, it’s very good for beginners
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne P

customer_reviews.title: Great starter kit
customer_reviews.text: Great starter kit, with this and a few youtube videos I was able to teach myself how to crochet and have enjoyed making a variety of things.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked for me! (With youtube)
customer_reviews.text: Worked for me! Well, with youtube suppliment, just like with the knitting version (I didn't know how to crochet or knit before getting either of these books). Paterns are great for beginners.
customer_reviews.author: ashcatchafew

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: The instructions are lacking clarity. The tools are of fine quality but I learned more on YouTube than the booklet. Disappointing really.
customer_reviews.author: Molly Swenson

customer_reviews.title: NOT as pictured
customer_reviews.text: Booklet I received is different from what is shown. I really would have wanted to make the hat pictured but my booklet shows a blanket for a baby :-( I opened it thinking maybe the hat directions were included but sadly no. Guess I'll make a scarf instead, Not worth the expense of returning. Instructions are OK.
customer_reviews.author: JUST-ME

customer_reviews.title: I ended up watching YouTube videos instead
customer_reviews.text: Would be nice if it came with a small bit of string you can practice with. Instructions weren’t as easy to follow as I would have liked.
customer_reviews.author: AFDP

customer_reviews.title: Great for Crochet class
customer_reviews.text: This item was purchased for adult students of a crochet class. The master instructors were pleased with the kit, and the students loved it! It gives them every thing they need to begin to crochet - and they did. All students were doing a chain stitch row, and with that row, they made a doile - all in that first class!
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Great book for the price
customer_reviews.text: The price was good and I liked that it came with everything (besides the yarn) that I needed to crochet. I found it a little hard to do (not the book's fault) by looking at pictures and realized it is much easier to learn by watching a video. But this is a good book to have and look at. My 10 year old daughter is going to use it next.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Southard

customer_reviews.title: Beanies and sweaters galore!
customer_reviews.text: Wife opened it immediately, and is already on her way to becoming a crochet master. Very easy to follow instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Hess

customer_reviews.title: The stitches and how to form them.
customer_reviews.text: I think it’s a good kit for a beginner because it shows the stitches and how to make them and then put them together to make something useful. My daughter wants to learn how to crochet and I am sure my granddaughters will want to learn as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I bought these for my wife on Christmas and she ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my wife on Christmas and she loves them .

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: It’s easier to just buy the hooks and watch you tube videos

customer_reviews.title: Nice kit but it didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this in hopes of learning to crochet simple stitches while I was on bed rest from a surgery. Perhaps it's just me, but I wasn't able to move past the first few stitches. I think I may need more hands-on guidance so I plan to use the book to take notes while I watch some online crochet videos or hopefully, find someone local who teaches a class. The crochet needles seem to be of high quality and I'm sure I'll make good use of them once I learn by another method. Overall, this kit is very nice but it didn't give me the results I hoped for.
customer_reviews.author: Barb Webb

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a birthday gift for my cousin. She's thrilled to learn and have a nice set of hooks. Will update if she has any problems or comments.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Teacher
customer_reviews.text: This kit has been wonderful in teaching a teenager the art of crocheting. She is thrilled with the patterns and the ability to express her own sense of fashion.

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for Beginners
customer_reviews.text: I am a self taught Crocheter. I used to look at patterns and immediately cry. I ordered this book and I was able to Crochet the hat on the cover my best friend. She lived it. It's a great value too!
customer_reviews.author: April Lashon

customer_reviews.title: These are great for learning with easy directions
customer_reviews.text: These are great for learning with easy directions. My granddaughter took one home with her. 8 years old! So impressive.

customer_reviews.title: Soo easy, my young daughter has been looking at picking ...
customer_reviews.text: Wife wanted to learn and this was by far the easiest for her to get going. Soo easy, my young daughter has been looking at picking up CROCHET!
customer_reviews.author: Lyle Moeller

customer_reviews.title: The kit I received is a completely different product
customer_reviews.text: The product i received is NOT AT ALL what is pictured or described. While the product does include some Susan Bates products, the booklet is Red Heart and completely different and includes different projects, and only 15. The crochet hooks are different and there is NO afghan hook included in the kit. I will call this the old bait and switch routine. Way to false advertise!!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie S.

customer_reviews.title: This is the perfect way to do that
customer_reviews.text: Cannot wait to relearn to crochet. This is the perfect way to do that!
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Beckett

customer_reviews.title: All in one kit!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the beginner or someone getting back into crocheting.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Teaches pretty good
customer_reviews.text: If you ever want to learn crochet, this is for you. Easy learning, photo's and all. Thanks for all the help.
customer_reviews.author: liz

customer_reviews.title: Necessary and Useful.  You can learn to crochet with this kit.
customer_reviews.text: I have not crocheted in 50 years. That being said, I am a novice all over again. However, having been through this book, I am at least up to adequate or even confident in my skills, so much so that over this past weekend I completed a nursery blanket for a soon to arrive great-niece that I won't be ashamed to give. That would not have been the case without this kit. If I can learn to crochet using this, anyone can. And I am now proficient in far more stitches than I ever knew.
customer_reviews.author: IrishDee

customer_reviews.title: First timer
customer_reviews.text: I needed an introduction and this kit, in addition to watching videos on youtube, were it! I'm definitely on my way into more complex patterns after just a week or two going through the stitches and two of the projects in this collection. I'm not a fan of all the included projects, but they do give you plenty to choose from that will test your skills. And it's easy to find some youtube videos to clear up any confusion, or to find other free patterns you're interested in. The supplies, like hooks, gauge measure, etc., are great and have been very helpful so far. You might need to expand your collection eventually, but these provide an important base.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah D

customer_reviews.title: Yeay
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping, came as advertised and no missing pieces . Good price,All and all happy with my purchase 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: MissL

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The book was eh. Learned more efficiently by watching youtube videos.
customer_reviews.author: Mik

customer_reviews.title: confusing instructions
customer_reviews.text: Great set of hooks but the instructions are a little confusing. Instructions are for right and left handers which is great because I am left handed.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a gift and she liked it.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a good tool for a beginner like me.
customer_reviews.author: Julia V.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for learning like my 9 year old grand daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Berilla Consoer

product_meta.title: Learn Crochet! Kit
product_meta.description: Size:1 PACKCOATS&CLARK-Susan Bates: Learn Crochet. The essentials you need to get you started crocheting are all here. Each kit contains five Susan Bates Silvalume crochet hooks (US sizes G, H, I, J and K), one afghan hook, two yarn needles, and a Knit Chek. An instruction book with simple instructions and clear diagrams make learning easy. The book contains sixteen projects to make and includes left hand instructions. Imported.
feature_bullets: The essentials you need to get you started crocheting
It contains five Susan Bates Silvalume crochet hooks(us sizes G, H, I, J & K) one afghan hook, two yarn needles and a knit check
An instruction book with simple instructions and clear diagrams make learning easy
The book contains more than thirty projects to make and includes left hand instructions
